ai.title: AI
ai.description: SmartCore has AI-based analysis technology, mining technology, machine learning and deep learning technology to effectively utilize big data, and adopt Federated Learning AI which has deepened this, we conduct research to apply it to an AI-based collaboration platform and various fields.

contents.title: Federated AI Platform
contents.text: Through federated learning AI technology, we build an integrated AI platform that supports distributed collaboration with enhanced collaboration efficiency and business-critical information security.

contents.title: Federated Learning AI
contents.text: Forming a core data learning model based on Federated Learning and edge computing, and introducing AI in a way that only exchanges learned data models without transmitting data locally, forming a collaborative ecosystem between AI platforms through efficient data exchange and processing, and Enhance security.

contents.title: Data Labeling
contents.text:
It is necessary to select high quality data that can understand the context by refining vast amounts of data in order to maximize the data modeling learning effect of federated learning AI.
Accordingly, the composition of learning elements through data labeling is applied to form a data classification and utilization system of a federated learning AI collaboration platform that supports distributed collaboration.
In particular, Web 3.0 Object Link implements a distributed collaborative economy ecosystem through linkage with blockchain.

contents.title:
Consortium for
Federated AI Platform
contents.text:
SmartCore is a data modeling system applied with UI/UX, blockchain module, federated learning AI algorithm, and integrated AI platform that incorporates
Management System. In order to apply the real business environment, We are developing a platform by forming a consortium with companies from EU countries (Turkey, Portugal, Romania).

subContents:

blockchain.title: Blockchain
blockchain.description:
We developed a blockchain platform based on self-constructed and developed blockchain technology such as consensus algorithm and mainnet,
on an AI platform that supports distributed collaboration. Develop related technologies to strengthen data security and integrity by applying identity verification function between users and modules.

contents.title:
Blockchain Module for
AI Platform
contents.text:
Enhances the security of data model exchanges on the AI platform through applying blockchain to an AI platform that supports distributed collaboration,
verifying device suitability and data integrity in interplatform interworking and data storage functions, and smart contract functions.

patent.text:

fintech.title: Fintech
fintech.description:
It implements Financial Technology, SMPP (SmartCore Pay Platform), BLE, NFC, MRS, IC technology,
safe and optimized mobile with integrated professional technology and professional manpower. Develop a simple payment system.

pay.title: Payment Technology
pay.description: We have implemented various payment technologies such as Bluetooth low energy communication, NFC, short-range wireless communication technologies, IC, MSR, and QR, and develop solution technologies for mobile simple payment systems by combining them.

security.title: Security Technology
security.description: We have implemented mobile identity authentication technology and blockchain technology in fintech, and based on this, we develop data reliability and security enhancement technologies such as hacking prevention and payment data flow tracking.

iot.title: IoT
iot.description:
SmartHome and sensor network technology and wearable communication technology have been implemented, and
developed to link with deep learning and block chain technology using big data.

network.title: Sensor Network Technology
network.description: We have the technology to acquire information from sensors applying OSGI, OMA, and M2M technology, and to control and monitor devices through network formation.

warable.title: Wearable Telecommunication Technology
warable.description: We are researching and developing short-range wireless communication technology for connection and data exchange between wearable devices.

deep.title: Deep Learning
deep.description: Based on data collected through sensors and wearable devices, it is implemented to analyze behavior patterns through deep learning, and technology is developed to determine and prevent risk factors.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.policy_1: The privacy policy of ‘Smart Core’ is as follows.
privacy.policy_2_title: Consent to the collection and use of personal information
privacy.policy_2_description: Your valuable personal information is collected and used according to the following policy. Smartcore collects only personal information related to the purpose, and promises to protect and manage the collected information transparently and safely. .
privacy.policy_3_title: Purpose of collection and use of personal information
privacy.policy_3_description: Collected to confirm users who wish to request a project and to provide accurate answers to requests (estimation, period, development, etc.).
privacy.policy_4_description01: -Project request information, attached files, contact person information (company name, name/position, phone number, e-mail)
privacy.policy_4_description02: -Personal information collection method: Enter information through the website (Request)
privacy.policy_4_description04: - In principle, after the purpose of collecting and using personal information is achieved, the information is destroyed without delay. However, the following information will be retained for the period specified for the reasons below.
privacy.policy_4_description05: - Reason for preservation: Within 6 months after request, keep until project contract ends and then destroy
privacy.policy_5_title: Right to decline consent and when to deny consent
privacy.policy_5_description: Consent to the collection and use of essential information is essential for answering inquiries and consulting, so inquiries can only be answered with consent.
